text:
@DavidAFrench Masks reduce oxygen intake, right?
How is anyone struggling with COVID19 onslaught going to benefit from Masks?
A lot of Mental masturbation on Masks & Social distancing.
U want to veil yourself. Go ahead. But don't force me. 
#LiberalismIsTheRealPandemic
